overview: Co-founder and CTO of Protecode, Kia Mousavi has 12 years of software industry experience. He has held key positions as technical team lead, senior software architect and chief systems integrator with companies such as Alcatel, Nortel, Siemens and Ubiquity Software (acquired by Avaya in 2007). He has also provided technology consulting to Adobe Systems, IBM and Juniper Networks. Kia holds an Electrical Engineering degree from Ottawa University.
